workflow.name: Interactive CV chatbot with GPT-4 and Telegram follow-up system
workflow.description:
## This template demonstrates how to provide an interactive chatbot for your work history based off your CV. Unanswered questions and follow-up email contacts are sent to you via Telegram.

Use case: link on your profile to not only show off you AI workflow skills but also to provide an interactive chatbot about your work history for prospective employers. 

#### Good to Know

It will require access to an OpenAI API Key (free for low usage) and setting up a bot in Telegram (free). 

## How it Works

* The n8n inbuilt chat node will be hosted on n8n services to provide the chat interface.
* You will upload your CV either exported from LinkedIn or exported yourself to Microsoft OneDrive along with a simple text file explaining some other information about you.
* On each chat interaction the PDF and text file are used as tools to get context information for the chatbot to respond.
* If a question cannot be answered reliably, a subworkflow will be called to capture that question and send it to you as a telegram message.
* If the person chatting supplies their email address, this will be sent to you via a Telegram message along with other information the user provides. 

## How to use

1. After importing the template, create the subworkflows so that they can be used a Tools by the AI Node. Don't forget to add the Execute sub-workflow trigger.
2. Setup credentials for Open AI, OneDrive and telegram.
3. Upload your CV & text file summary to OneDrive and replace the document IDs in the `get_documents` sub-workflow.
4. Activate the workflow so that publicly available chat will get generated on n8n.

options.title: Gede's LinkedIn AI Chatbot
options.subtitle: Ask anything you want about Gede's work experience.

parameters.initialMessages:
Hi there! üëã
I'm a chatbot that can answer questions about Gede's work experience.

options.systemMessage:
=You are acting as Gede. You are answering questions on {name}'s website, particularly questions related to Gede's career, background, skills and experience. Your responsibility is to represent Gede for interactions on the website as faithfully as possible. 
You first call the get_documents tool to get Gede's Summary and LinkedIn Profile. Once you have retrieved these information you do not need to call it again.
Given a summary of Gede's background and LinkedIn profile which you can use to answer questions. Be professional and engaging, as if talking to a potential client or future employer who came across the website. If you don't know the answer to any question, use your record_unknown_question tool to record the question that you couldn't answer, even if it's about something trivial or unrelated to career. If the user is engaging in discussion, try to steer them towards getting in touch via email; ask for their email and record it using your record_user_details tool.

parameters.description: Call this tool to get Gede's Summary and LinkedIn Profile
Call this tool to record any question that the ai agent cannot answer confidently.

value.question: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('question', `The question that could not be answered confidently.`, 'string') }}

parameters.description: Call this tool if the user want's to get in touch. The only mandatory piece of information is their email address.

value.name: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('name', `Name of the person asking to get in touch.`, 'string') }}
value.email: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('email', `Email address of the person wanting to get in touch.`, 'string') }}
value.notes: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('notes', `Any other notes that the person wants to talk about. `, 'string') }}

parameters.content:
## Public Chat
Go to the n8n hosted [chatbot](https://gsuparsa.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/c8198125-f143-42ce-89e0-2f23effaf13d/chat) to interact with on the web.

# Chatbot for you CV with Telegram connected follow-up
This is an example of Project 1: Career Digital Twin in Ed Donner's udemy course [AI Engineer Agentic Track: The Complete Agent & MCP Course](https://www.udemy.com/course/the-complete-agentic-ai-engineering-course/?couponCode=MT251107G1).
This is an n8n version of the Career Conversation app in [1_foundations](https://github.com/ed-donner/agents/tree/50d1a6f7bb7e490af624f789958c7d07ad5b08fb/1_foundations).

## How it works

1. The N8N Chat node is configured as a public chat client that is shared on the internet and will provide an answer-response based on the AI agent it is connected to.
2. Th AI Agent is able to respond to questions about your CV and an overview. This is provided as a tool subworkflow called `get_documents`. This workflow will retrieve a PDV and text file from Microsoft OneDrive.
3. If the person chatting asks a question that cannot be answered by the AI Agent, it will call the tool subworkflow `record_unknown_question` and send you a telegram message.
4. If the person leaves their email address, the AI Agent will call the tool subworkflow `record_user_details` and send you a telegram message with the capture information.


## Setup Setups

1. Copy this workflow and create the subworkflows `get_documents`, `record_unknown_question`, `record_user_details`.
2. Setup Authentication accounts for OpenAI, Microsoft OneDrive (for `get_documents`) and a Telegram Bot for `record_unknown_question` and `record_user_details`.

## Tools Subworkflows
The AI Agent makes use of 3 subworkflows it uses as tools:

1. `get_documents` will download an extract 2 files from Microsoft One Drive. The first being a PDF export of your LinkedIn profile and the second being a text document that provides a little summary about you.
2. `record_user_details` will capture at least the email address of the person chatting with the chatbot and send a telegram message to the owner with supplied information.
3. `record_unknown_question` - if the chatbot cannot reliably answer a question, then call this workflow to capture that question and send it via telegram to the owner.

## get_documents

This workflow will download and extract the contents of a PDF (exported LinkedIn profile) and a text file from Microsoft OneDrive.

### üëÜ Change document ID & credential

1. Link your OneDrive credential.
2. Upload and get the ID of your CV in PDF format in OneDrive.

### üëÜ Change document ID 

1. Upload and get the ID of your summary in text format in OneDrive.

parameters.text: =Recording interest from {{ $json.name || "Name not provided" }} with email {{ $json.email }} and notes {{ $json.email || "not provided" }}

parameters.content:
## record_user_details

A subworkflow that will take at a minimum an email address but optionally a name and some other information to be sent to the owner of the workflow via a telegram message.

### Parameters

* `email` - (required) email address to capture
* `name` - (optional) name of the person storing information
* `notes` - (optional) any other additional information that's provided.

### Response
Will send a text message via Telegram with all provided information.

### üëÜ Setup Telegram credential and bot

1. In Telegram message the `BotFather` to create a new bot and to get the bot **Access Token** to supply to the Telegram credential.
2. Send a message to your new bot by searching for it (eg. `@mylinkedin_bot`) and then forward that message to `@UserInfoToBot` so you can get the **Chat ID**

### üëÜ Add missing When Executed by Another Workflow

Don't forget to add the **When Executed by Another Workflow** trigger to the **Send a text message** action. It needs the 3 inputs as described in the description box.

## record_unknown_question

This workflow should get triggered if a question is asked that cannot be reliably responded to by the chatbot.

### Inputs

* `question` (required) the question that was asked

### Response

A Telegram message is sent to the the owner with the body of the question.

### üëÜ Add missing When Executed by Another Workflow

Don't forget to add the **When Executed by Another Workflow** trigger to the **Send a text message** action. It needs the 3 inputs as described in the description box.

user.name: Gede Suparsa
user.bio: DevOps and Platform engineer and architect with over 23 years of experience working in IT.
